Text: GSM World Congress Comes to Cannes AgainGSM World Congress February Cannes France cgibinfoamclickcgiical Dear MR M MC CONNELL The key global meeting place for the GSM industry is once more happening in Cannes next February Highlights of the GSM World Congress included attendees Congress delegates countries represented exhibiting companies Over Congress delegates at director level or higher press For the agenda has been completely reworked keynote speakers from all sides of the industry will give an unparalleled strategic overview while the largest exhibition of GSM products will allow you to get a detailed understanding of the current and forthcoming product and service offerings The introduction of the Application Developers Zone gives a unique opportunity to assess the latest innovations from the most pioneering companies to enter the marketplace Bookings are already ahead of and alongside the comprehensive agenda speakers and extensive exhibition over exhibitors are further additions including Technical Conferences The GSM Awards and dinner nominations are open now Mobile Billing The GSM Dailies all the news from the show The GSM NewsReel the online show and mobile world update The GSM World Focus Txttag And much more cgibinfoamclickcgiical Book now to reserve your place at the unmissable GSM event cgibinfoamclickcgiical or contact Tamara James on or We look forward to seeing you at the GSM World Congress Ken Cooke Marketing Manager Informa Telecoms Media PS IBC is the worlds largest organiser of telecommunications conferences Please see below for other key upcoming gathering places for the mobile community Prepaid Mobile January Amsterdam Netherlands Mobile Entertainment April London United Kingdom SMS Congress May Amsterdam Netherlands A complete list of our upcoming events can be seen at cgibinfoamclickcgiical PPS Baskerville publish the best mobile newsletters available today From mobile Internet and messaging to IPCore networks and G our newsletters keep executives strategically informed monthly fortnightly and daily Read them free for days at cgibinfoamclickcgiical If you do not wish to receive information and news on this subject in future please reply to this email with the message UNSUBSCRIBE in the subject line and you will be removed from this list The personal information shown in this email or provided by you will be held on a database and may be shared with companies in the Informa Group in the UK and internationally Sometimes your details may be obtained from external companies for marketing purposes If you do not wish your details to be used for this purpose please write to the Database Marketing Manager Informa UK Enterprise House Station Approach West Byfleet Surrey KT NN Email Remove from list
